message.body: Hey. You guys were still on the phone when I went to bed...and, there's no check waiting for me to take this morning. Did things change, our did she just fall asleep before being able to write the check?
She wrote the check. She got the account number. Btw I am very grateful that you can go to the bank for me. Is there a chance that you can go in the
afternoon? Not morning.
Sure. That helps you?
I woulda thought morning would be better.
Tremendously.
Very complicated why.
It's cool. No problem.
We hung up at four
Thank you.
Jeez. She was talking at me from 8pm-until you.
Love you, and not because of the bank.
Love you too, and not because you saved ME from being the target until 4am! :-)
A possibility.

She was mad at me the other day. I came home and she was mad. Wasn't even here to do/say anything. Said she was trying to drink the anger away (like that's worked even once!) Talked at me angrily for hours.
Then, when sober, she denies what she says & do
It's very sad. I'm sorry you have to go thru that.
I moved more stuff out of here yesterday. More on Tuesday.
Thanks. Not for long! :-)
Will you be in Tucson may 20?
Athena's grad at 6:30pm.
Yeah!
James, me and Casey will be in some parade here on the 18th. Representing the chip club of all things.
Chips off the old block.
And what an old block it is.
When's good to deposit?
Any time now. Ty
Thanx very much.
Are you driving thru lv on your way to Tucson?
Was trying to decide... Probably not.
Ok
My fucking car just broke down on the side of the road. Waiting for the tow truck. Might slit my wrists.
Omg! I'm so sorry.
It APPEARS that the car may have run out of gas. The gage or fuse broke this week??????? It started after getting gas.
Whew! I hope that's all it was!
